attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 20 years ago I had problems with long delays, being on hold for an unacceptable time on the phone. This is no better now 20 years on. It costs   3.95p per min on a local rate 0845 number. Let's assume 100 companies keep only 500 callers  a day waiting for only 5mins that's £987.50 lost to the customer. THIS CANNOT BE GOOD for us but great for phone companies. Let's stop it now we have had enough.
